channel.title: Trying to make my own private server
channel.description:
i am trying to find out how to make my own server but have know idea how i have a little bit of exp with comps but don't know how to make my own server.
the reason i am trying to make my own prvate server is because my comp will not work with .rar files only .zip and these days u can never find a good serverwith a .zip file

item.description:

ok i got the sever [[Homiescape]] its is just get the lcient that comes with it change some things the click run sever and put the client on a downloadable place then let ppl download it and your done you dont have to do anything mine works.

item.title: Trying to make my own private server
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

austheboss:

i am just gana find out how to make my own server can anyone tell me?

It’s not quite as simple as a one line reply, maybe you should come back in a year or two when you’re more experienced with computers? That’s what I did.
